TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug that contains the active ingredient vincristine sulfate, which is used to treat many types of cancer. Oncovin brand has been taken off the market and is no longer available.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que contiene el ingrediente activo sulfato de vincristina, que se usa para el tratamiento de muchos tipos de cáncer. La marca Oncovin se retiró del mercado y ya no se consigue.
